description: This table stores information about appointment requests.

columns.name: REQUEST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the appointment request record. If the appointment request is also an order, this column can be joined to the ORDER_PROC_ID column in the ORDER_PROC tables.

columns.name: REQ_IS_ACCIDENT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not the reason for visit is related to an accident, workers' compensation, or other third party liability guarantor.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: REQ_SPECIAL_BILL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the research or client record that contains special billing flags for this visit. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).

columns.name: REQ_FIN_OUTPUT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Questionnaire Answers record that contains the results from running a Financial Decision Tree.

columns.name: REQ_FIN_SCREEN_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that the financial screening was last run on this order or appointment request.
